question: You are planning to give a party at home. You want to cook a meal for this party and decided to ask a friend for a recipe from his/her country. Write a letter to this friend. In your letter -	Tell the friend why you are giving this party-	Explain why you want a recipe from his/her country-	Invite your friend to the party
text: How are you and your family? I am writing this letter because I want you to share your mother’s Filipino recipe to make for a party at my house the day after tomorrow.

I am having this party for my community friends. Since they are from the Philippines and India, I thought of asking you to help me with the recipe of Pancit Bihon as you are from there. I need to send links or call me as I need to get the ingredients to make this main course dish.

I am inviting you to please attend this party as you can meet other Filipinas and make friends since you are new to the city. I would love for you to come home to help make the dish as it is my first time trying to cook your version.
See you soon and try to come a little early for us to have fun cooking together.
